Apache 2.4.20 (0day) Exploit 
---------------------------------

OS : Unix kernel based system

Size : 6kb

Public online advertised for selling, so it must exist for sometime privately already.

If that is true it affect many servers :(

text: No info provided, concrete security issues to security@apache.org.
